title: r/nba
description: A subreddit dedicated to NBA news and discussion.

items.title: What team does Lauri Markkanen play for next season?
items.content_html:
I think it is highly unlikely Lauri is a Chicago Bull next season and most likely walks this summer. But what team would pay for him and what kind of contract should/would he get?

Also to add onto this, does anyone still have hope Markkanen can figure it out and become a really good player. I remember he had a ton of hype after his rookie season with comparisons to Dirk.
